comments.body:
I think these wagons should be separate physical objects to avoid ugly levitation at the edges of the blocks.
Closed wheel arches are also suitable, which will not allow you to see the wheels. This will help avoid the argument that wheels should be cubic/pixel round.
This will help a lot please put this in the game
I think Bedrock and Java edition should be combined into a whole new Minecraft. You should combine the features.

I think the point is that it cost a lot time to change every single /execute command in every single map. I hope the new execute could be added into nonexperimental by a separate new command like /executeraw, /comexecute, etc. Therefore, it will not affect our finished project.
And for EVERY old Map for the Bedrock edition, because you CANT'T change the versons in MCBE
Don't add "end cat" bcuz it's crazy to have a cat to an end of an game so... What's the meaning of "end" if there's a cutie pie wondering around the "end" of the game ..
Pls guys vote for this maybe it will be sike
My minecraft not played multiplayer in server

This would be great for both lore and gameplay, and would solve the server running out problem.  Completely agree

SimplySarc had a good idea that you could cure them with amethyst. His reasoning was that it makes a calming musical sound, so placing a whole bunch of amethyst around a vex would cause it to become relaxed, and loose it‚Äôs corruption. It also gives amethyst another use.

An easy way to remedy this while still allowing for it to spawn in cave water would by just making it only spawn on stone types.
Please put Free full game minecraft in ps4
Yes, it‚Äôs so annoying and if you put in the chat /kill and then pick your thing goats appear in the list and it‚Äôs like why!!
Also a log for object interaction for inspection to see who interacted with and block. Similar to the Inspection feature on Java.

I agree with this, especially since they have a range of 8 blocks vertically. While the ladders would still make storage systems a bit larger, it would be far more organised, and easier for players to access their chests as well (without dozens of ramps blocking them).

Of course, this is assuming you want to see the copper golems working. While it wouldn't be as neccesary if they were kept behind your storage system, that does take away from how much work has been made to make their movement fun and lively.

It would also just be really cute to watch them climbing ladders, and more cute watching them reach from the ladders into chests. For ballancing sake (pun intended), their sorting could be slower on a ladder, since realistically they would need to be more careful as to not fall.
